About Us

Energy Service Company

‌Eenovators Limited is a private limited company having its headquarters in Kenya, operating as an Energy Service Company dedicated to providing innovative and reliable clean energy management solutions that meet our clients’ needs. Our mission is to empower the community through on the Productive Use of Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency (PURE³).

Eenovators is a leading provider o innovative energy solutions, committed to helping our clients achieve operational efficiency, reduce energy costs, and enhance sustainability. We utilize the Energy Service Model (ESCO) to deliver significant savings with minimal financial investment. Eenovators has expanded its operations to Tanzania and Uganda, demonstrating our commitment to driving sustainability across Africa.

excerpt.rendered: About UsEnergy Service Company ‌Eenovators Limited is a private limited company having its headquarters in Kenya, operating as an Energy Service Company dedicated to providing innovative and reliable clean energy management solutions that meet our clients’ needs. Our mission is to empower the community through on the Productive Use of Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency […]
